text:
Patch to make the jxpath: return multiple values separated by a comma.
The result (for example) can be used to iterate using for-each.
creator: nicolaken@apache.org
nicolaken@apache.org
text:
Oops, forgot to add the example for test.xml ;-)

Here is is:

   <echo message="XMLDOM (all top-level property names):
${jxpath:/references/test.xml/root/project/property/@name}" />

creator: nicolaken@apache.org
text:
Now the patch contains also a new feature: JXpath uses the Ant properties as 
variables in the xpath.

    <!-- Example of using an Ant property as a variable in jxpath -->
    <property name="jartoget" value="myJars"/>
    <echo message="${jxpath:/references[@name=$jartoget]}" /> 
    <!--                                 ^^^^^^^^^^^^     -->

Created attachment 2823
JXPath.java.diff  (supercedes the previous one)
creator: nicolaken@apache.org
